resources.string: openSUSE is a free and Linux-based operating system for your PC, Laptop or Server. You can surf the web, manage your e-mails and photos, do office work, play videos or music and have a lot of fun!
Fedora is a fast, stable, and powerful operating system for everyday use built by a worldwide community of friends. Its completely free to use, study, and share.
Linux Mint is a free Linux-based operating system designed for use on desktop computers.
